name: Cycle Tasks (universal dind + Open Codex CLI)
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y pipx libsecret-1-0 && sudo -u vscode pipx ensurepath && sudo -u vscode pipx install --force open-codex && open-codex --version
postStartCommand: sudo -u vscode sh -c 'set -e; SSH_ENV="$HOME/.ssh/agent.env"; mkdir -p $HOME/.ssh && chmod 700 $HOME/.ssh; if [ -S "${SSH_AUTH_SOCK:-}" ]; then ACTIVE_SOCK="$SSH_AUTH_SOCK"; echo "Using forwarded SSH agent at $ACTIVE_SOCK"; else ACTIVE_SOCK="$HOME/.ssh/ssh-agent.sock"; eval "$(ssh-agent -a $ACTIVE_SOCK)" >/tmp/ssh-agent.log; echo "Started container ssh-agent at $ACTIVE_SOCK"; fi; echo export SSH_AUTH_SOCK="$ACTIVE_SOCK" > $SSH_ENV; grep -q agent.env $HOME/.bashrc || echo "[ -f $SSH_ENV ] && . $SSH_ENV" >> $HOME/.bashrc; . $SSH_ENV; gh --version || true; ssh -T git@github.com 2>&1 | sed -n '1p' || true'
